1452600.name: Potato's Dream
1452600.description:
A Potato with a dream of becoming something more - help it obtain its dream in the kitchen. This is a clicker game about a Potato wanting to become a basket of fries; Story Book mode will take you through the Potato's Dream. There are many things to do along the way, just remember to have fun. There are upgrades, auto clickers, chip upgrades, and even random events that pop up from time to time.

Hand-drawn graphics, retro-style music(2 Songs), and lots of cosmetics help make this game a fun experience.





  • Basic CPS 1-20 Upgrades
  • Adv CPS 1-15 Upgrades
  • Chips+ 1-15 Upgrades
  • Spawn Item 1-30 Upgrades
  • More Levels Added Soon!





  • CPS Booster
  • Speed Booster
  • XP Booster





  • Clicking
  • Pets
  • Stopping Flies
  • Clicking Falling Objects
  • Upgrading your Abilities
  • Changing Outfits
  • Changing Backgrounds
  • Finding Easter Eggs
  • Forever Free Updates!
  • +Much More in Future Updates!


NOTE: I'm always looking to improve the game, so any feedback or suggestions would help out a lot :D!
